/* pages/my/version/version.wxss */

page {
background: #060700;
height: 100vh;
}
.drive,
.shadows {
background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
position: fixed;
top: 0;
right: 0;
bottom: 0;
left: 0;
}
.shadows text{
color: black;
font-size: 12px;
}
.drive view {

position: absolute;
left: 50%;
top: 50%;
border: 1px solid rgba(8, 61, 235, 0.993);
box-shadow: 0 4vw 8vw rgba(2, 203, 238, 0.582) inset;
width: 100vw;
height: 100vh;
animation: drive 10s linear infinite;
animation-direction: reverse;
}

.shadows view {
position: absolute;
left: 50%;
top: 50%;
background: rgb(34, 47, 224);
width: 100vw;
height: 100vh;
animation: shadows 10s linear infinite;
animation-direction: reverse;
}

.drive view:nth-child(1) {
animation-delay: 0;
}

.drive view:nth-child(2) {
animation-delay: -1s;
}

.drive view:nth-child(3) {
animation-delay: -2s;
}

.drive view:nth-child(4) {
animation-delay: -3s;
}

.drive view:nth-child(5) {
animation-delay: -4s;
}

.drive view:nth-child(6) {
animation-delay: -5s;
}

.drive view:nth-child(7) {
animation-delay: -6s;
}

.drive view:nth-child(8) {
animation-delay: -7s;
}

.drive view:nth-child(9) {
animation-delay: -8s;
}

.drive view:nth-child(10) {
animation-delay: -9s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(1) {
animation-delay: 0;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(2) {
animation-delay: -1s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(3) {
animation-delay: -2s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(4) {
animation-delay: -3s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(5) {
animation-delay: -4s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(6) {
animation-delay: -5s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(7) {
animation-delay: -6s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(8) {
animation-delay: -7s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(9) {
animation-delay: -8s;
}

.shadows view:nth-child(10) {
animation-delay: -9s;
}

@keyframes drive {
0% {
transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.05) rotate(0deg);
}
100% {
transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0) rotate(-45deg);
}
}

@keyframes shadows {
0% {
transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.05) rotate(0deg);
opacity: 0;
}
100% {
transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0) rotate(-45deg);
opacity: 0.25;
}
}
